channel.title: I need help with 3 differnt codes
channel.description: First, when I go to change crowns for in-game there is no crown packet in models. Second, I noticed in a server I used to play there was no cash limit so how do i change that in my pi. Lastly, we have are server updated and all new items but i dont remember how to make your character look new and not boxy.

item.title: I need help with 3 differnt codes
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

  1. Look for sprites?
  2. Are you sure? Haven’t seen one over the usual limit, thats just me, limit is 2.147b, you could make it so you have multiple stacks of cash, or use something else for currency (Like a paper in game that each is worth 1b, 2b, etc.)
  3. IMO I wouldn’t play a server like that, sounds like a generic project insanity loading 600+ diarrhea, but if you want to you will have to make it load a higher revision

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with 3 differnt codes
